snippet.title: OFF THE GRID | Early Access Trailer - 4K
snippet.description:
Play OTG in Early Access for free: https://otg.gg/play

The future of Battle Royale starts NOW! Welcome to Off The Grid, the heart-pounding Extraction Royale where survival is just the beginning. Dive into a dark, cyberpunk world crafted by visionary director Neill Blomkamp (District 9) and prepare to augment, adapt, and dominate like never before!

Equip your team with cutting-edge cyberlimbs, unleash devastating abilities, and outsmart your rivals as you fight for the ultimate prize—hard-earned loot. Every battle is a chance to strategize, switch tactics on the fly, and prove you’ve got what it takes to rise to the top.

Ready to rewrite the rules of Battle Royale? Gear up, drop in, and make your mark on the future!

Download Off The Grid:
- PC (Epic): https://otg.gg/PC
- PlayStation: https://otg.gg/playstation
- Xbox: https://otg.gg/xbox


#OffTheGrid #ExtractionRoyale #otg 


--------

Follow Off The Grid’s social media channels: 
👉 Discord: https://discord.gg/offthegrid
👉 Website: https://playoffthegrid.com
👉 Twitter: https://twitter.com/playoffthegrid  
👉 Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/playoffthegrid/  
👉 Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/PlayOffTheGrid/  
👉 TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@playoffthegrid
